code: import cache,{CacheKey}from'../utils-storage';export const isReviewDone=id=>{const data=cache.get(CacheKey.REVIEW_STATE);if(data){return data[id];}return false;};export const setReviewState=(id,state)=>{const data=cache.get(CacheKey.REVIEW_STATE);if(data){data[id]=state;cache.set(CacheKey.REVIEW_STATE,data);return;}const newData={};newData[id]=state;cache.set(CacheKey.REVIEW_STATE,newData);};
